name: QrPayloads
summary: Helpers for building common QR payloads with recommended defaults.

members.name: Text
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Text(string text)

members.name: Url
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Url(string url)

members.name: Bookmark
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Bookmark(string url, string title)

members.name: WhatsAppMessage
members.signature: static QrPayloadData WhatsAppMessage(string message, string number)

members.name: Wifi
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Wifi(string ssid, string password, string authType, bool hidden, bool escapeHexStrings)

members.name: Email
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Email(string address, string subject, string message, QrMailEncoding encoding)

members.name: Mms
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Mms(string number, string subject, QrMmsEncoding encoding)

members.name: Sms
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Sms(string number, string message, QrSmsEncoding encoding)

members.name: Phone
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Phone(string number)

members.name: Geo
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Geo(string latitude, string longitude, QrGeolocationEncoding encoding)

members.name: CalendarEvent
members.signature: static QrPayloadData CalendarEvent(string subject, string description, string location, DateTime start, DateTime end, bool allDayEvent, QrCalendarEncoding encoding)

members.name: Contact
members.summary: Builds a contact payload (MeCard or vCard).
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Contact(QrContactOutputType outputType, string firstname, string lastname, string nickname, string phone, string mobilePhone, string workPhone, string email, Nullable<DateTime> birthday, string website, string street, string houseNumber, string city, string zipCode, string country, string note, string stateRegion, QrContactAddressOrder addressOrder, string org, string orgTitle, QrContactAddressType addressType)

members.name: SkypeCall
members.signature: static QrPayloadData SkypeCall(string username)

members.name: AppStoreApple
members.summary: Builds an Apple App Store payload.
members.signature: static QrPayloadData AppStoreApple(string appId, string countryCode)

members.name: AppStoreGooglePlay
members.signature: static QrPayloadData AppStoreGooglePlay(string packageId)

members.name: FacebookProfile
members.signature: static QrPayloadData FacebookProfile(string handleOrUrl)

members.signature: static QrPayloadData TwitterProfile(string handleOrUrl)

members.signature: static QrPayloadData TikTokProfile(string handleOrUrl)

members.signature: static QrPayloadData LinkedInProfile(string handleOrUrl)

members.signature: static QrPayloadData LinkedInCompany(string handleOrUrl)

members.name: Upi
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Upi(string vpa, string name, string merchantCode, string transactionRef, string transactionNote, Nullable<decimal> amount, string currency)

members.name: BitcoinLike
members.signature: static QrPayloadData BitcoinLike(QrBitcoinLikeType type, string address, Nullable<double> amount, string label, string message)

members.name: Monero
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Monero(string address, Nullable<float> amount, string paymentId, string recipientName, string description)

members.name: ShadowSocks
members.signature: static QrPayloadData ShadowSocks(string hostname, int port, string password, QrShadowSocksMethod method, string tag)

members.name: ShadowSocks
members.summary: Builds a Shadowsocks URI payload with parameters.
members.signature: static QrPayloadData ShadowSocks(string hostname, int port, string password, QrShadowSocksMethod method, Dictionary<string, string> parameters, string tag)

members.name: OneTimePassword
members.summary: Builds an otpauth URI payload for HOTP/TOTP.
members.signature: static QrPayloadData OneTimePassword(OtpAuthType type, string secretBase32, string label, string issuer, OtpAlgorithm algorithm, int digits, Nullable<int> period, Nullable<int> counter)

members.name: Detect
members.summary: Detects the most likely payload type from a raw input string.
members.signature: static QrPayloadData Detect(string input, QrPayloadDetectOptions options)

members.name: PayPalMe
members.signature: static QrPayloadData PayPalMe(string handleOrUrl, Nullable<decimal> amount, string currency, bool useHttps)

members.signature: static QrPayloadData Girocode(string iban, string bic, string name, decimal amount, string remittanceInformation, QrGirocodeRemittanceType remittanceType, string purposeOfCreditTransfer, string messageToGirocodeUser, QrGirocodeVersion version, QrGirocodeEncoding encoding)

members.signature: static QrPayloadData BezahlCodeContact(QrBezahlAuthorityType authority, string name, string account, string bnc, string iban, string bic, string reason)

members.summary: Builds a BezahlCode single payment payload (non-SEPA).
